messages.subject: [samuraihistory] Sengoku Jinmei Jiten
messages.msgSnippet: Hello I am very interested in this book too. Any clue where I can have a snapshot at its content (website maybe) or buy it on the Internet? Thank you Brand ...
messages.messageBody:
Hello

I am very interested in this book too. Any clue where I can have a snapshot
at its content (website maybe) or buy it on the Internet?

Thank you

Brand
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kitsuno" <samurai-listowner@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 26, 2004 2:36 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Re: Mandai family


Assuming the Sengoku Jinmei Jiten he has is the same one I have, I
found mine in a bookstore in Kyoto.
